attributes.action: OUTLAW ALL EXTREAMIST GROUPS NAMELY GROUPS LIKE; THE ENGLISH DEFENCE LEAGUE
attributes.additional_details: Ban all extremist groups in the United Kingdom showing the world that we here in the UK stand united against all types of abhorrent racism, fascism, bigotry and xenophobia. This will show the world that the United Kingdom is a progressive society leading the way in reform of your laws for the betterment of everyone no matter of your race, religion, gender, sexual orientation or skin colour. Let’s not tolerate those who spread hate and fear in our communities, those who seek to create tension and unrest in our communities. Let this petition banning all extremist groups not only just the English defence league but all extreme groups be our first stand for the dream of a utopia which all citizens in the UK deserve.
